description: Transform PDF documents into easy-to-read e-books or editable text formats automatically, perfect for reading on the go or repurposing content
pdf-converter-description: Converts PDF files to Markdown or EPUB format with automatic processing and progress monitoring
pdf-converter-pdf-url: URL of the PDF file to convert
pdf-converter-max-attempts: Maximum progress check attempts before timeout
pdf-converter-ignore-pdf-errors: Ignore PDF parsing errors to continue conversion
pdf-converter-ignore-ocr-errors: Ignore OCR errors to continue conversion
pdf-converter-download-url: URL to download the converted file
